skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Frontend developer skilled in building responsive and interactive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and API integration.

skills.title: React
skills.description: Skilled in building fast SPAs using React.js, JSX, Hooks (useState, useEffect), Context API, and React Router. Experienced with Redux, Axios, and component-driven development.

skills.title: React Native
skills.description: Learning to build mobile apps using React Native. Familiar with core components, React Navigation, Flexbox styling, Expo, and performance tools like FlatList.

skills.title: Competitive Programmer
skills.description: Competitive programmer with strong skills in C++ and Data Structures & Algorithms. Solving problems on platforms like Codeforces, LeetCode, and CodeChef.

portfolio.title: Worldwise
portfolio.description: A smart travel tracking application built with React, helping users mark and remember visited places.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: A real-time weather forecast application built with React and OpenWeather API integration.

portfolio.title: Travellistapp
portfolio.description: A packing list app for travellers, helping organize items efficiently before trips. Built with React.

portfolio.title: React-Quiz
portfolio.description: A dynamic and interactive quiz application built using React, designed to test and enhance knowledge through fun quizzes.
